about_the_game:
• Two new outfits (male and female) with three different skins each
  • Two new hats
  • New backpack
  • New tractor: Lunar Vehicle
  • New tractor antenna: Satellite Dish
  • Two new trees: Spore Palm Tree and Foxfire Tree
  • New farm decoration: Rocket
  • New fence: Communication Poles
  • New road: Lunar Soil, Steel Panels
  • New house: Lunar Base
  • New house tool: Stellar Cooker
  • New house decorations: Stellar Armchair, Stellar Sofa, Stellar Table, Stellar Chair, Stellar Countertop, Stellar Kitchen Sink, Stellar Cupboard, Stellar Lamp, Fluorescent Light Fixture, Stellar Projector, Stellar Mainframe, Stellar Wardrobe, Hibernation Pod, Round Stellar Window and Square Stellar Window
  • New house door
  • New house walls and floor
detailed_description:
• Two new outfits (male and female) with three different skins each
  • Two new hats
  • New backpack
  • New tractor: Lunar Vehicle
  • New tractor antenna: Satellite Dish
  • Two new trees: Spore Palm Tree and Foxfire Tree
  • New farm decoration: Rocket
  • New fence: Communication Poles
  • New road: Lunar Soil, Steel Panels
  • New house: Lunar Base
  • New house tool: Stellar Cooker
  • New house decorations: Stellar Armchair, Stellar Sofa, Stellar Table, Stellar Chair, Stellar Countertop, Stellar Kitchen Sink, Stellar Cupboard, Stellar Lamp, Fluorescent Light Fixture, Stellar Projector, Stellar Mainframe, Stellar Wardrobe, Hibernation Pod, Round Stellar Window and Square Stellar Window
  • New house door
  • New house walls and floor

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.10 or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+, tested on OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Farm Together - Oxygen Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Plenty of Space themed content for Farm Together, such as new outfits, decorations and farm items to plant and harvest!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Romanian, Swedish, German, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Simplified Chinese, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Hungarian, Japanese, Thai, Danish, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Czech, Korean
